mapper.select:
SELECT a.*,b.name as project_name FROM ems_pole a,ems_project b where a.project_id=b.id and customer_id=#{customer_id}
and workunit_id is null
and (lower(a.name) like lower('%${nameORcode}%') or lower(a.code) like lower('%${nameORcode}%'))
order by code

select a.*,b.name as subtype_name,c.name as prod_name,c.spec as prod_spec,d.name as brand_name,e.name as supplier_name,g.quality_month as prod_quality_month from ems_equipment a inner join ems_equipmentsubtype b on a.subtype_id=b.id inner join ems_equipmentprod c on a.prod_id=c.id inner join ems_brand d on a.brand_id=d.id inner join ems_supplier e on a.supplier_id=e.id inner join ems_equipment_pole f on a.ecode=f.ecode inner join ems_orderlist g on a.orderlist_id=g.id where f.pole_id=#{id}
select count(ecode) from ems_equipment_pole where pole_id=#{pole_id}

SELECT a.*,b.ecode,b.style,b.last_install_date,c.name as subtype_name,d.name as prod_name,d.spec as prod_spec,e.name as brand_name,f.name as supplier_name FROM (select a.*,b.name as customer_name from ems_pole a,ems_customer b where a.customer_id=b.id and a.customer_id=#{customer_id})a left join ems_equipment_pole g on a.id=g.pole_id left join ems_equipment b on g.ecode=b.ecode left join ems_equipmentsubtype c on b.subtype_id =c.id left join ems_equipmentprod d on b.prod_id=d.id left join ems_brand e on b.brand_id=e.id left join ems_supplier f on b.supplier_id=f.id order by a.code asc
